hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
#!/bin/bash if [ -d ".env" ]; then echo "**> virtualenv exists" else echo "**> creating virtualenv" ~/.localpython/bin/python2.7 ~/.localpython/lib/python2.7/site-packages/virtualenv.py .env fi source .env/bin/activate pip install python-dateutil requests logging unittest2 argparse paramiko > /dev/null export CLOUDCAFE_TEST_CONFIG="$WORKSPACE/config/tq_search/local.search.config" export CLOUDCAFE_LOG_PATH="$WORKSPACE/data" export PYTHONPATH="$PYTHONPATH:$WORKSPACE/lib"
cat > "$CLOUDCAFE_TEST_CONFIG" <<-"EOF_CAT" # ====================================================== # local.search.config # Use this configuration file to run against search local # ======================================================
[misc] serializer = json deserializer = json
[auth] base_url = username= password= version = core_auth_url = https://ws.staging.core.rackspace.com/ctkapi/ core_username = melissa.biles core_password = qwerty core_version = core account_services_url = https://staging.account.api.rackspace.com/v1.0/ account_services_username = priy0835 account_services_password = Password=163463 zendesk_ticket_url = https://mosso.zendesk.com/api/v2/ zendesk_username = isl_qe_usq@lists.mosso.com zendesk_password = j@cks zendesk_version = zendesk lefty_username = controlpanel_alpha lefty_password = zxcvBN=30 lefty_base_url = https://staging.identity-internal.api.rackspacecloud.com lefty_version = 2.0_internal
[gate] base_url = http://staging.search.api.rackspace.com/ elastic_search_url = http://staging.elastic.search.api.rackspace.com/ start_time = 2013-03-12 03:00:26 start_time_1 = 2013-03-12 05:50:26 start_time_2 = 2004-02-09 09:00:26 utc_start_time_3 = 2012-01-01T00:00:00.000Z utc_end_time_1 = 2013-01-01T00:00:00.000Z end_time = 2013-03-12 06:02:26 utc_start_time = 2013-03-12T08:00:26.000Z utc_start_time_1 = 2013-03-12T10:50:26.000Z utc_start_time_2 = 2004-02-09T15:00:26.000Z utc_end_time = 2013-03-12T11:02:26.000Z status_1 = New status_2 = Scheduled status_3 = In Progress status_4 = No Feedback status_5 = Unsolved status_type = 8 tq_search_priority_1 = Normal tq_search_priority_2 = High priority_1 = 1 priority_2 = 2 priority_3 = 3 account_number_1 = 942261 account_number_2 = 896236 account_number_3 = 829213 account_number_4 = 1009995 account_number_5 = 11 source_system = 5 queue_name = AR/Cancellations queue_name_1 = Intensive (All Teams) utc_date_constant = .000+0000 content_type = application/json account_type_1 = CLOUD account_type_2 = MANAGED_HOSTING team_name = Team UK M24 team_name_alt = Team A1 queue_id = 13 queue_id_alt = 12 queue_id_alt_ref_1 = 16 queue_id_alt_ref_2 = 1 queue_id_ref = 2 subject_1 = New subject assignee_user_id = matt.printz assignee_user_name = Matthew Printz sync_queue_id = 11 sync_sub_category = 11206 sync_account_id = 11 sync_ticket_text = "Ticket Text Message" sync_ticket_list = [] sync_ticket_subject = "Generic core ticket" sync_ticket_subject2 = "Generic core ticket two" sync_source = 1 sync_severity = 1 end_time_1 = 2013-02-10 15:00:26 utc_end_time_1 = 2013-02-10T21:00:26.000Z tq_search_account_number_1 = MANAGED_HOSTING858926 tq_search_account_number_2 = MANAGED_HOSTING918664 sleep_100_sec = 100 sleep_30_sec = 30 team_number = 129 queue_id_alt_ref = 497 base_url_ord = https://api.staging.ord.ticketing.encore.rackspace.com/v1 account_id=5908639 data_centre=DFW pubsub_url_ord=https://pubsub.staging.ord.ticketing.encore.rackspace.com pubsub_url_dfw=https://pubsub.staging.dfw.ticketing.encore.rackspace.com base_url_dfw=https://api.staging.dfw.ticketing.encore.rackspace.com/v1 base_url_ord=https://api.staging.ord.ticketing.encore.rackspace.com/v1 sync_wait_time=10 [lefty]
EOF_CAT
./bin/runner.py tq_search local.search.config -t type=lefty-positive --generateXML=/lib/ccengine/common/Report
